synopsis.text: Kiryuu, a mischievous spirit, joins the chaotic life of Tasuke, an ordinary Japanese teenager who is already being watched over by two Shugotten, Ruuan and Shaorin. As Tasuke navigates the complexities of adolescence, he finds himself at the center of a supernatural love triangle while also dealing with the romantic advances of his classmates. Amidst the whirlwind of magical shenanigans and daily challenges, Tasuke and Shaorin explore the depths of their feelings for each other, as they learn the true essence of love and the reasons behind Shaorin's decision to stay by Tasuke's side. The story unfolds through a series of loosely connected episodes, showcasing the growth of their unique bond and the hilarious complications that arise from their extraordinary living situation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
